@graph.caption: pizza snack bites on a white plate

@graph.name: Easy Vegan Pizza Snack Bites (Gluten-free) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: With these easy Vegan Pizza Bites, you get allthe flavors of pizza in bite-size form. Grain-free, low carb & gluten-free, made with almond flour.

@graph.name: Vegan Pizza Bites
@graph.description: With these easy Vegan Pizza Bites, you get all of the delicious flavors of pizza in bite-size form. These pizza snack balls are grain-free and gluten-free, made with almond flour and sun-dried tomatoes. Makes 10-14 balls
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup sundried tomato (,dry pack, not packed in olive oil)
1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil (, see note for oilfree)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sundried tomato and almond flour to a food processor and process until the sundried tomatoes are a coarse meal.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sundried tomato and almond flour to a food processor and process until the sundried tomatoes are a coarse meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of dry ingredients and pulse a few times to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of dry ingredients and pulse a few times to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: The mixture should now be like well moistened crumbs that should hold together when you press them. If not add a bit more olive oil. If too crumbly (if using almond meal) you might need to add a tsp or so regular flour. **Transfer the mix to a bowl and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Remove the bowl from the refrigerator and press and roll into balls. Place the balls on parchment baking sheet and bake at 300F(150 c) for 12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: The mixture should now be like well moistened crumbs that should hold together when you press them. If not add a bit more olive oil. If too crumbly (if using almond meal) you might need to add a tsp or so regular flour. **Transfer the mix to a bowl and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Remove the bowl from the refrigerator and press and roll into balls. Place the balls on parchment baking sheet and bake at 300F(150 c) for 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: After baking, let them cool completely and store in the refrigerator up to 2 weeks.
recipeInstructions.name: After baking, let them cool completely and store in the refrigerator up to 2 weeks.

@graph.keywords: pizza bites, pizza snack balls, savory snack bites
